LUKE 8.42 unte dauhtar ainoho was imma swe wintriwe twalibe, jah so swalt.
miþþanei þan iddja is, manageins þraihun ina.

LUKE 8.43 jah qino wisandei in runa bloþis jera twalif, soei in lekjans fraqam allamma aigina seinamma, jah ni mahta was fram ainomehun galeikinon, LUKE 8.44 atgaggandei du aftaro attaitok skauta wastjos is, jah suns gastoþ sa runs bloþis izos.
laugnjandam þan allaim qaþ Paitrus jah þai miþ imma:
talzjand, manageins biƕairband þuk jah þreihand, jah qiþis:
ik auk ufkunþa maht usgaggandein af mis.
LUKE 8.47 gasaiƕandei þan so qino þatei ni galaugnida, reirandei qam jah atdriusandei du imma, in þizei attaitok imma, gataih imma in andwairþja allaizos manageins jah ƕaiwa gahailnoda suns.
LUKE 8.48 iþ Iesus qaþ du izai:
LUKE 8.49 nauhþan imma rodjandin gaggiþ sums manne fram þis fauramaþleis swnagogais, qiþands du imma þatei
LUKE 8.50 iþ is gahausjands andhof imma qiþands:
LUKE 8.51 qimands þan in garda ni fralailot ainohun inngaggan, alja Paitru jah Iakobu jah Iohannen jah þana attan þizos maujos jah aiþein.
LUKE 8.52 gaigrotun þan allai jah faiflokun þo.
ni gretiþ, unte ni gaswalt, ak slepiþ.
LUKE 8.53 jah bihlohun ina gasaiƕandans þatei gaswalt.
LUKE 8.54 þanuh is usdreibands allans ut jah fairgreipands handu izos wopida qiþands:
LUKE 8.55 jah gawandida ahman izos, jah ustoþ suns.
iþ is faurbaud im ei mann ni qiþeina þata waurþano.
LUKE 9.1 Gahaitands þan þans twalif apaustauluns atgaf im maht jah waldufni ufar allaim unhulþom jah sauhtins gahailjan.
LUKE 9.2 jah insandida ins merjan þiudangardja gudis jah gahailjan allans þans unhailans.
ni waiht nimaiþ in wig; nih waluns nih matibalg nih hlaib nih skattans,
LUKE 9.4 jah in þanei gard gaggaiþ, þar saljiþ jah þaþroh usgaggaiþ.
LUKE 9.5 jah swa managai swe ni andnimaina izwis, usgaggandans us þizai baurg jainai jah mulda af fotum izwaraim afhrisjaiþ du weitwodiþai ana ins.
LUKE 9.6 usgaggandans þan þairhiddjedun and haimos wailamerjandans jah leikinondans and all.

LUKE 9.7 gahausida þan Herodis sa taitrarkes þo waurþanona fram imma alla jah þahta, unte qeþun sumai þatei Iohannes urrais us dauþaim. LUKE 9.8 sumai þan qeþun þatei Helias ataugida sik; sumai-uþ-þan þatei praufetus sums þize airizane usstoþ.
Iohannau ik haubiþ afmaimait, iþ ƕas ist sa, bi þanei ik hausja swaleik?
LUKE 9.10 jah gawandjandans sik apaustauleis usspillodedun imma, swa filu swe gatawidedun.
jah andnimands ins afiddja sundro ana staþ auþjana baurgs namnidaizos Baidsaiïdan.
LUKE 9.11 iþ þos manageins finþandeins laistidedun afar imma, jah andnimands ins rodida du im þo bi þiudangardja gudis jah þans þarbans leikinassaus gahailida.
LUKE 9.12 þanuh dags juþan dugann hneiwan.
atgaggandans þan du imma þai twalif qeþun du imma:
fralet þo managein, ei galeiþandans in þos bisunjane haimos jah weihsa saljaina jah bugjaina sis matins, unte her in auþjamma stada sium.
nist hindar uns maizo fimf hlaibam, jah fiskos twai, niba þau þatei weis gaggandans bugjaima allai þizai manaseidai matins.
LUKE 9.14 wesun auk swe fimf þusundjos waire.
gawaurkeiþ im anakumbjan kubituns, ana ƕarjanoh fimf tiguns.
